prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with vibrant yellow feathers and striking black accents.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that resembles a bird and has a unique combination of colors.
Design a creature that embodies the spirit of a guardian with a fierce yet playful demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in lush forest environments and has lightning-fast movements.
Show me a mythical creature that has both elegance and power, with a colorful feathered appearance.
Make a dynamic Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings while maintaining a vivid color palette.
Give me a Pokemon with a distinctive body shape that can soar through the skies effortlessly.

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Fast and agile, utilizing electric attacks
